articles.author: Kishan Vaghela
articles.title: Steve Bruce pictured for the first time since his Newcastle sacking as England thrash Australia - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 60-year-old left the Magpies 'by mutual consent' with a full £8million payoff on 20 October following the club's £305m takeover by a Saudi-led consortium at the start of the month.
articles.content:
Steve Bruce was seen enjoying a holiday in Dubai as he was pictured for the first time since his Newcastle sacking earlier this month.
The 60-year-old left the Magpies 'by mutual consent' with a ful… [+3252 chars]

articles.author: Dan Hiergesell
articles.title: Khamzat Chimaev sends message to Diaz, Masvidal after UFC 267 win: ‘Let’s see who is real gangster’ - MMA Mania
articles.description: Khamzat Chimaev talks about potential matchups with Nate Diaz and Jorge Masvidal after his UFC 267 submission win over Li Jingliang.
